peersim.kademlia
Class StateBuilder

java.lang.Object
  peersim.kademlia.StateBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
peersim.core.Control
public class StateBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements peersim.core.Control

Initialization class that performs the bootsrap filling the k-buckets of all initial nodes.
In particular every node is added to the routing table of every other node in the network. In the end however the various nodes doesn't have the same k-buckets because when a k-bucket is full a random node in it is deleted.
